mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( b_seq, b_title , b_content , b_tag , b_loc , lat , lng , mem_email , b_file , lm_seq ) VALUES ( t_board_SEQ.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_tag}, #{b_loc}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{mem_email}, #{b_file}, #{lm_seq} )
mapper.select: select A.mem_photo , A.mem_nick , A.mem_joindate , A.mem_Introduce , B.b_file , b.b_seq from t_member a , t_board b where a.mem_email = b.mem_email and a.mem_email = #{mem_email} group by A.mem_photo, A.mem_nick, A.mem_joindate, A.mem_Introduce, B.b_file, b.b_seq
